ProMDM Redesigned

ProMDM is a mobile device management solution that enables companies to remotely control their mobile devices - track status, push new or update existing mobile applications, control access to company's on-line resources, wipe stolen devices etc. First version of the ProMDM admin interface was designed as very simple and clean UI, but growing number of features required thorough redesign.

Type of work:

UI Design Frontend Coding

Redesign of administration user interface, front-end coding in HTML/CSS - Bootstrap/jQuery

Case Study »

Technologies:
  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Bootstrap
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
